definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="stack">stack</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:stack</field><value name="VAL"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">var bar=CustomAPI.getCustomBar(stack);</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">bar.numerator>10</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">bar.numerator=100;</field></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">bar.numerator+=2;</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="controls_if" x="35" y="380"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">var</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">定义变量</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">bar</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">变量名</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">CustomAPI</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">类名</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">getCustomBar</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">函数名</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">CustomAPI.getCustomBar(stack)</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">将局部变量stack传作参数调用getCustomBar函数</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">denominator</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">单词翻译：分母</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">numerator</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">单词翻译：分子</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">visible</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">单词翻译：可显示的</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">class CustomBar {&#10;    int numerator;&#10;    int denominator;&#10;    boolean visible;&#10;}</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">组件类</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>
